description: This waterproof-breathable jacket is built for colder, wetter weather. Zip between the jacket and fleece liner while finding your just-right fit with the adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem. Your essentials are safe in the secure, zippered hand pockets.
name: Columbia Sportswear Hikebound Interchange Jacket - Tall - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester - Smooth Face Grid Back Fleece
